title: graha vIkSaNamu
sahitya:
graha vIkSaNamu kanna sadguru-vanugraha vIkSaNamEminna


anupallavi

  ihamu paramu leTununnA madilO gAnamu gAnamu kanna


caraNam 1    kalilOni sukhamu kanna kalalOni sukhamuminna
    caraNam 2    muripe mulara vinavalennA muraLI gAnamEminna
    caraNam 3    rAmakrSNuni sATi lEranuTa kannA Emivva galamu mEminta kanna
